title: Journey Orchestration service Events: SegmentExportJob Fields
description: This event is in relation with journey and Segment Export Job service event fields

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: Journey Orchestration Segment Export Job service event fields.
ID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The identifier of the segment export job triggered.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: status
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The status of segment export job.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: exportCountTotal
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The max possible value of segment export job

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: exportCountRealized
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The actual number of segments exported through the job

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: exportCountFailed
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The number of segments failed while exporting through the job

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: exportSegmentID
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The identifier of the segment being exported

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: eventType
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The event type indicating whether it is an error event of info event.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.title: eventCode
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/journeyO.description: The error code indicating the reason for corresponding eventType
